name: Oktoberfest Sausage ‘n Sauerkraut Bake
description: Celebrate a German Tradition! Use your favourite Oktoberfest sausages and pair with a robust German beer.
preparation: Place sausages on Sheet Pan lined with Sheet Pan Liner and roast for 10 minutes.

Toss peppers and onion with oil and then place on Sheet Pan with sausages. In heat-proof serving dish, stir sauerkraut with vinegar, Herb & Garlic Dip Mix, and maple syrup. Cover and place in oven on rack below sausages.
Roast until sausages are cooked through and peppers are soft, 10 – 15 more minutes.
tips: Serving Suggestion: Dish up with thick slices of pumpernickel bread.

products.name: Herb & Garlic Dip Mix
summary: Classic notes of chives, onion & garlic.

summary: Lightweight all-purpose baking sheet made from a single piece of aluminum, with a one-inch rim.
